text: Naboola mbu, ye aboolanga mbu : “shini ingombe yemilimo (yokhulima) tawe, nohomba shini yokhutsushilisilia amatsi emimela tawe, obukondo bwayo nobutswenufu muno, bubulamwo amapalapala,” Nibaboola mbu: “laano toto wakharera amakhuwa kwa habweene.” Mana nibayisinza ne nibabelenje ehale okhukhola endio
